modName: Remap Hotkeys and semi-autofire for mages
summary:
-Allows you to remap the 1-8 hotkeys
-Does not provide any new hotkeys

-Also provides autofire, which is useful for mages
descriptionHtml:
-Allows you to remap the 1-8 hotkeys
-Does not provide any new hotkeys

-Also provides autofire, which is useful for mages
-Not useful for melee attacks, since it messes up the native autofire
     -To disable autofire, just delete the appropriate sections

-Semi-Autofire effect: Holding down a mouse button will cause it to automatically release after the specified interval. It will not cause the button to fire again automatically.


Installation instructions:
1. Install Autohotkey
http://www.autohotkey.com/download/

2. Download my files

3. Right click the tray icon for AHK, and select \"Edit This Script\"

4. Copy and paste the text from my file into the AHK configuration file. Make modifications
http://www.autohotkey.com/docs/KeyList.htm

5. Right click the tray icon again and select \"Reload This Script\"
author: Okayvin
